Stream / canal reservation protection by earth filling of strip of 1.5m to 2m wide and average Depth of 0.5m, Turfing to new sloping soil surface (DAD D 01) or planting single row of vetiver grass with eco-friendly edible plants like Gotukola, Mukunuwenna, Thampala etc including application of compost manure and 02 months maintenance
